title: Wattle ballad. No. 1. My old black billy
brief_description: The song of the swagman who intends to “stick to me sensible, indispensable, old black billy”, sung by male voices and illustrated by shots of the swagman’s life. Arranged and sung by The Ramblers. Cast features Jock Levy.
